attributes.description: The term of which the  `_value_` attribute is the textual rendition (i.e. rubric).
attributes.name: defining_code

meta_info.description: A text item whose value must be the rubric from a controlled terminology, the key (i.e. the 'code') of which is the `_defining_code_` attribute. In other words: a `DV_CODED_TEXT` is a combination of a `CODE_PHRASE` (effectively a code) and the rubric of that term, from a terminology service, in the language in which the data were authored.
meta_info.name: DV_CODED_TEXT
